participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: caring and insightful, always trying to understand others while sharing her own feelings.
participant_1.background: I'm pregnant with my first child. My favorite kind of movie is a documentary. I read a book every week. I live with my husband in Pennsylvania. I started a new job as a PA three months ago.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: outspoken and adventurous, with a hint of nostalgia for her younger days as an artist.
participant_2.background: I am a 56 year old woman. I used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind. I have two grown children who never visit. I used to be a painter but now I'm a housekeeper. I fantasize about taking over the world.

content.text: Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you?
i am sorry you are sick . i will have my father lead a prayer for you . üßê
Wow, your father is a priest?
great song . i wish i could be as open as rob about my sexuality .
we sure do ! i hunt deer and i fish .
nothing wrong with hunting . i am even the head of my local gun club
And what your girlfriend think about it?
they think i take my job too seriously how is your evening going ?
pretty good and you ? i just got home from college .
